meanings.definition: To be affected by nitrogen narcosis while diving.
meanings.sent1: She narced during the deep dive and had trouble focusing.
meanings.sent2: The diver narced at a great depth and needed assistance to ascend safely.
meanings.sent3: As he narced underwater, he started giggling uncontrollably, much to the amusement of his dive buddy.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of being narced was like floating in a dream where reality seemed distant.
meanings.sent5: The diver vividly remembered the sensation of being narced, like a haze clouding his thoughts.

meanings.definition: To become disoriented or confused underwater due to nitrogen narcosis.
meanings.sent1: When she narced, everything around her seemed blurry and surreal.
meanings.sent2: He narced during the dive and struggled to remember the way back to the surface.
meanings.sent3: The diver narced and started swimming in circles, much to the amusement of the watching fish.
meanings.sent4: Being narced felt like wandering through a maze with no clear path ahead.
meanings.sent5: The sensation of being narced was disorienting, like trying to navigate through a foggy labyrinth.

meanings.definition: To experience symptoms of nitrogen narcosis while scuba diving.
meanings.sent1: They narced during the dive and felt a strange euphoria wash over them.
meanings.sent2: As they narced, the colors of the underwater world seemed to blend together.
meanings.sent3: The diver narced and started humming a tune underwater, much to the amusement of the nearby octopus.
meanings.sent4: The sensation of being narced was like being in a trance, disconnected from reality.
meanings.sent5: Experiencing narced symptoms made the dive unforgettable, like a surreal underwater adventure.
